example.parse: (IP (ADVP (AD 然而)) (NP-SBJ (CP (WHNP-1 (-NONE- *OP*)) (CP (IP (NP-SBJ (-NONE- *T*-1)) (VP (ADVP (AD 这样)) (VP (VA 奔放)))) (DEC 的))) (NP (NN 创新) (NN 手法))) (PU ，) (VP (ADVP (AD 还是)) (ADVP (AD 不)) (VP (VV 合於) (NP-OBJ (NP-PN (NR 王壮为)) (CP (WHNP-2 (-NONE- *OP*)) (CP (IP (NP-SBJ (-NONE- *T*-2)) (VP (VA 严谨))) (DEC 的))) (NP (NN 个性))))))
example.arg: *OP* *T*-1 这样 奔放 的 创新 手法
王壮为 *OP* *T*-2 严谨 的 个性
